org.jhotdraw.draw.handle
Class BezierControlPointHandle

java.lang.Object
  org.jhotdraw.draw.handle.AbstractHandle
      org.jhotdraw.draw.handle.BezierControlPointHandle
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener, FigureListener, Handle
public class BezierControlPointHandle
extends AbstractHandle

A Handle which allows to interactively change a control point of a bezier path.

Version:
$Id: BezierControlPointHandle.java 717 2010-11-21 12:30:57Z rawcoder $
Author:
Werner Randelshofer
